jobs.title: Dev-Ops Engineer
jobs.description: Implemented new logging system full stack, improving logging throughput and developer experience for internal build system.
bullets: Enhanced Java logging backend by replacing MongoDB based logging system with non-blocking I/O native solution, accomodating for real-time updates and drastically improved performance
Modified build system to implement logging system in Go
Created web interface for logging system using React and Redux, allowing for real-time updates and improved developer experience

jobs.title: SDE Intern
jobs.description: Drastically improved Astro Floor Plan Service Feedback in Java on AWS
bullets: Redesigned negative feedback workflow from the ground up
Improved negative feedback result loop from 24 hours to 1 hour

jobs.title: Software Test Engineer Co-Op
jobs.description: Coordinated with development team to improve testing and quality assurance
bullets: Created automated testing framework in LabVIEW for testing Single Board Computers prior to production
Created software solution to enable effect tracking of hardware health over time in various conditions, using MongoDB and C#

jobs.title: SDE Intern
jobs.description: Created negative feedback data layer workflow for Astro Floor Plan Service in Java on AWS
bullets: Created data layer for negative feedback workflow, allowing for customers to provide feedback on Astro's positioning during hangout
Implemented data layer in Java using AWS DynamoDB

jobs.title: Student Software Developer
jobs.description: Created multiple software solutions for the Dean's office of the College of Arts, Humanities, and Social Sciences
bullets: Created tool for processing department travel requests, funneling into Docusign documents for approval, while also providing a dashboard for tracking requests; Used for over 500 requests per semester
Created google suite solution for hiring and approving adjunct faculty for department using TypeScript
